quote: He wished he was doing much more than kissing the back of her silky hand, though throwing her on the bar and devouring her like a man-eater wasn't a wise option.But... he was only human.
quote_letters: HE WISHED HE WAS DOING MUCH MORE THAN KISSING THE BACK OF HER SILKY HAND THOUGH THROWING HER ON THE BAR AND DEVOURING HER LIKE A MAN-EATER WASNT A WISE OPTIONBUT HE WAS ONLY HUMAN
